Curs BNR: Cursul valutar al zilei de vineri, 1 noiembrie 2019. Cum evoluează valutele înainte de weekend

01 Nov 2019, 10:58

Cursul BNR al zilei, Cursul valutar, Cursul de schimb euro si dolar, arhivă curs valutar, evoluţie valute, arhivă curs leu/euro, curs mediu anual, curs mediu lunar, curs mediu leu/euro anual, curs mediu leu/euro lunar, arhivă curs BNR. Cursurile pieţei valutare sunt calculate şi afişate de BNR, pe baza tranzacţiile interbancare.

Notă ZF: Cursul afişat este calculat şi anunţat de Banca Naţională pe baza tranzacţiilor interbancare.

text:
BNR exchange rate: The exchange rate for Friday, November 1, 2019. How currencies evolve before the weekend

01 Nov 2019, 10:58 am

BNR exchange rate of the day, Foreign exchange rate, Euro and dollar exchange rate, currency exchange rate, currency evolution, leu / euro exchange rate, annual average rate, monthly average rate, average leu / euro annual rate, average leu / euro monthly rate, BNR course archive. The exchange rates are calculated and displayed by the NBR, based on the interbank transactions.

The NBR course on Friday
:




Euro

4.7576
+0.0004
+ 0.01%



American dollar

4.2614
-0.0151
-0.35%



Swiss franc

4.3163




ZF Note: The rate displayed is calculated and announced by the National Bank on the basis of interbank transactions.
